main event: An object was observed traveling toward the witness on July 30, 1959, described as initially yellow-white and changing to dull red before stopping directly overhead.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes., The observer was under a overhead at the time of the sighting., The UFO was reported to have stopped directly above the witness., The initial color of the object changed from yellow-white to dull red., The conclusion of the report was that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: The observer provided a handwritten account of the observation.
